select categoryName, productTitle, productContent, startPrice, bidPrice, startTime, expireTime, uploadPath, uploadFileName, fileExtension from product
left join image on product.productId = image.productId
where isProductCheck = 1
order by startTime desc
limit #{pageNum}, #{amount}
select categoryName, productTitle, productContent, startPrice, bidPrice, startTime, expireTime from product where isProductCheck = 1 and product.productId = #{productId};
select image.productId, uploadPath, uploadFileName, fileExtension from image left join product on image.productId = product.productId where isProductCheck = 1 and product.productId = #{productId};
